alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Millard...northwestern Garfield...northwestern Piute...southwestern Sevier...eastern Beaver and northeastern Iron Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 845 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 40 miles northwest of Cove Fort to 11 miles northeast of Milford to 12 miles north of Paragonah. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Milford, Cove Fort, Minersville, Manderfield, Adamsville and Black Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 88 and 148. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 9. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 69 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
